Package uk.ac.ucl.motioninput.newCamera

Class NewCameraInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ucl.motioninput.newCamera.NewCameraInput
  • public class NewCameraInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Edited version of MediaPipe's Android CameraInput Changes made: Renamed to NewCameraInput Added cameraPermissionsGranted() Added permissionsAlreadyGranted check in NewCameraInput constructor Original documentation: The camera component that takes the camera input and produces MediaPipe TextureFrame objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  NewCameraInput.CameraFacing
      Represents the direction the camera faces relative to device screen.

      Initializes CamereInput and requests camera permissions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Closes the camera input.
      boolean isCameraRotated()
      Returns a boolean which is true if the camera is in Portrait mode, false in Landscape mode.

      Sets a callback to be invoked when new frames available.

      Sets a callback to be invoked when camera start is complete.

      Sets up the external texture converter and starts the camera.

      Sets or updates the size of the output TextureFrame.

      • start

        public void start​(Context context,
                  androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner,
                  EGLContext eglContext,
                  NewCameraInput.CameraFacing cameraFacing,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Sets up the external texture converter and starts the camera.
        Parameters:
        context - an Android Context.
        eglContext - an OpenGL EGfLContext.
        cameraFacing - the direction the camera faces relative to device screen.
        width - the desired width of the converted texture.
        height - the desired height of the converted texture.

      • updateOutputSize

        public void updateOutputSize​(int width,
                             int height)
        Sets or updates the size of the output TextureFrame. Can be invoked by SurfaceHolder.Callback.surfaceChanged when the surface size is changed.
        Parameters:
        width - the desired width of the converted texture.
        height - the desired height of the converted texture.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the camera input.

      • isCameraRotated

        public boolean isCameraRotated()
        Returns a boolean which is true if the camera is in Portrait mode, false in Landscape mode.
